          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20626744">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20626744">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20626744">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topic Narrowing for Short Papers
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20626744">
          <div id="boxatt20626744" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24067202">
              <a id="link_24067202" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5CEL" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24067202,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24067202}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Business and Finance
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A 2-vol. complete reference covering five general areas: finance and banking; accounting; marketing; management; and information systems. Drawing on practical professional expertise as well as that of noted scholars, the contributors include executives, government administrators and scholars from leading business programs.
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/Bonds.PDF">
                sample
               </a>
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20626683">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20626683">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20626683">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative Resources for the Short Papers
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20626683">
          <div id="boxatt20626683" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24066983">
              <a id="link_24066983" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066983,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24066659">
              <a id="link_24066659" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066659,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19721252}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. An "aggregator database" containing the full text of trade journals and other business periodicals. Known for its subject indexing. Strong on information about both industries and companies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24067139">
              <a id="link_24067139" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24067139,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25007399">
              <a id="link_25007399" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/10482" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25007399,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23403842}); ">
               Wall Street Journal via Proquest 1984 to present
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. The "paper of record" of the business world. Proquest version contains full text archive 1923-today. No charts or graphs
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22026324">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22026324">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22026324">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Choosing a company
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22026324">
          <div id="boxatt22026324" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25485401">
              <a id="link_25485401" href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/hottopics/lnacademic/?verb=sr&amp;csi=149023" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485401,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25485401}); ">
               LexisNexis Corporate Affiliations
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Gives the corporate hierarchy from parents through subsidiaries. A good way to get geographical distribution as well.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20596112">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20596112">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20596112">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Company Financial Data
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20596112">
          <div id="boxatt20596112" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24025140">
              <a id="link_24025140" href="https://www.sec.gov/edgar/searchedgar/companysearch.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24025140,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24025140}); ">
               EDGAR Company Filings
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Open access. Since 1934, the SEC has required disclosure in forms and documents. In 1984, EDGAR began collecting electronic documents to help investors get information. The SEC's new system requires data disclosure — the next step to improve how investors find and use information. Here is a
               <a href="http://abeweb.org/proceedings/proceedings12/12McGee.pdf">
                guide
               </a>
               for importing data from EDGAR into Excel.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24025141">
              <a id="link_24025141" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24025141,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24025141}); ">
               Google: Company websites
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Explore individual company websites. Look for sections targeting shareholders or investors.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24066650">
              <a id="link_24066650" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066650,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Company financial information. Also includes LEXISNEXIS CORPORATE AFFILIATIONS: choose Search by Subject &gt; Company Profiles &gt; Advanced: LexisNexis Corporate Affiliations.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20596113">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20596113">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20596113">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Corporate Mission/Strategies/History/Geography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20596113">
          <div id="boxatt20596113" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24025142">
              <a id="link_24025142" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24025142,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19721252}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. An "aggregator database" containing the full text of trade journals and other business periodicals. Known for its subject indexing. Strong on information about both industries and companies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24025144">
              <a id="link_24025144" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24025144,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21252254}); ">
               Google: Company websites
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Explore individual company websites. Look for sections targeting shareholders or investors.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25484547">
              <a id="link_25484547" href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/hottopics/lnacademic/?verb=sr&amp;csi=220620" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25484547,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25484547}); ">
               Hoover's Company Records
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available via library subscription to LexisNexis Academic
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24025145">
              <a id="link_24025145" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/aboutSeries.do?inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;seriesId=0IAD" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24025145,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24025145}); ">
               International Directory of Company Histories
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A reliable source of historical information for many companies: American and foreign, private and public, past and present-day.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485415">
              <a id="link_25485415" href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/hottopics/lnacademic/?verb=sr&amp;csi=149023" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485415,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25485401}); ">
               LexisNexis Corporate Affiliations
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Gives the corporate hierarchy from parents through subsidiaries. A good way to get geographical distribution as well.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20596114">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20596114">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20596114">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Country Commercial/Cultural Background
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20596114">
          <div id="boxatt20596114" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24066646">
              <a id="link_24066646" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066646,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19903917}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Gives basic demographics of a country, plus overview of political system. Most recent year only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485060">
              <a id="link_25485060" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/915353454?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485060,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25351002}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: Central &amp; South America
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Each 20-page country profile includes colorful maps—one highlighting world location and one with major cities and natural landmarks—and country flag, and 10 categories of information: General Information; Environment &amp; Geography; Customs &amp; Courtesies; Lifestyle; Cultural History; Culture; Society; Social Development; Government; and Economy. Each profile also includes full color photographs, valuable tables of information including fun “Do You Know?” facts, and a comprehensive Bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485092">
              <a id="link_25485092" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/920881509?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485092,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25485092}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: Central, South, &amp; Southeast Asia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Following the extensive introduction that summarizes this politically and physically complex part of the world, this volume provides 20-page profiles of all 24 countries that make up the vast region that is Central, South and Southeast Asia. Each includes colorful maps—one highlighting the country's location in the world, and one with its major cities and natural landmarks—and a country flag, plus 10 categories of information: General Information; Environment &amp; Geography; Customs &amp; Courtesies; Lifestyle; Cultural History; Culture; Society; Social Development; Government; and Economy. Each profile also includes full color photographs, valuable tables of information including fun “Do You Know?” facts, and a comprehensive Bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485091">
              <a id="link_25485091" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/933762828?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485091,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25485091}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: East Asia and the Pacific
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Following the extensive introduction that summarizes this politically and physically complex part of the world, this volume provides 20-page profiles of the 20 countries that make up East Asia and the Pacific. Each includes colorful maps—one highlighting the country's location in the world, and one with its major cities and natural landmarks—and a country flag, plus 10 categories of information: General Information; Environment &amp; Geography; Customs &amp; Courtesies; Lifestyle; Cultural History; Culture; Society; Social Development; Government; and Economy. Each profile also includes full color photographs, valuable tables of information including fun “Do You Know?” facts, and a comprehensive Bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485061">
              <a id="link_25485061" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/931883750?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485061,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25350990}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: Eastern &amp; Southern Africa
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The former of these two regions, the eastern part, is made up of the following countries: Djibouti, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Somalia, and South Sudan (all of the Horn area and inland), along with, below the Horn, Burundi, Comoros, Kenya, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mozambique, Rwanda, Seychelles, Tanzania, and Uganda. Some models shift the southeastern nations of Comoros, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mozambique, and Seychelles to the southern region of Africa, but here we include them under Eastern Africa. In Southern Africa, therefore, we have Botswana, Lesotho, Malawi, Namibia, South Africa, Swaziland, Zambia, and Zimbabwe. All told, 23 nations are examined in this volume.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485062">
              <a id="link_25485062" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/922889174?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485062,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25350997}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: Eastern Europe
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Following the extensive introduction that summarizes this politically and physically complex part of the world, this volume provides 20-page profiles of the 25 countries that make up eastern Europe. Each includes colorful maps—one highlighting the country's location in the world, and one with its major cities and natural landmarks—and a country flag, plus 10 categories of information: General Information; Environment &amp; Geography; Customs &amp; Courtesies; Lifestyle; Cultural History; Culture; Society; Social Development; Government; and Economy. Each profile also includes full color photographs, valuable tables of information including fun “Do You Know?” facts, and a comprehensive Bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485064">
              <a id="link_25485064" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/929879610?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485064,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25351005}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: Middle East &amp; North Africa
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Following the extensive introduction that summarizes this politically and physically complex part of the world, this volume provides 20-page profiles of the 21countries that make up this region of the world. Each includes colorful maps—one highlighting the country's location in the world, and one with its major cities and natural landmarks—and a country flag, plus 10 categories of information: General Information; Environment &amp; Geography; Customs &amp; Courtesies; Lifestyle; Cultural History; Culture; Society; Social Development; Government; and Economy. Each profile also includes full color photographs, valuable tables of information including fun “Do You Know?” facts, and a comprehensive Bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485066">
              <a id="link_25485066" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/933762773?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485066,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25350995}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: North America &amp; the Caribbean
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Following the extensive introduction that summarizes this politically and physically complex part of the world, this volume provides 20-page profiles of the 22 countries that make up North America and the Caribbean. Each includes colorful maps—one highlighting the country's location in the world, and one with its major cities and natural landmarks—and a country flag, plus 10 categories of information: General Information; Environment &amp; Geography; Customs &amp; Courtesies; Lifestyle; Cultural History; Culture; Society; Social Development; Government; and Economy. Each profile also includes full color photographs, valuable tables of information including fun “Do You Know?” facts, and a comprehensive Bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485067">
              <a id="link_25485067" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/933298758?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485067,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25350985}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: Western &amp; Central Africa
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The first of these two regions, the western part, is made up of the following 16 countries: Benin, Burkina Faso, Cape Verde, Cote d'Ivoire (Ivory Coast), The Gambia, Ghana, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Liberia, Mali, Mauritania, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, and Togo. The second region, Central Africa, consists of the following 9 countries: Angola, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chad, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Republic of the Congo, Equatorial Guinea, Gabon, São Tomé &amp; Príncipe. All told, then, 25 nations are examined in this volume.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485068">
              <a id="link_25485068" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/919635225?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485068,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25350999}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: Western Europe
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Following the extensive introduction that summarizes this politically and physically complex part of the world, this volume provides 20-page profiles of the 27 countries that make up western Europe. Each includes colorful maps—one highlighting the country's location in the world, and one with its major cities and natural landmarks—and a country flag, plus 10 categories of information: General Information; Environment &amp; Geography; Customs &amp; Courtesies; Lifestyle; Cultural History; Culture; Society; Social Development; Government; and Economy. Each profile also includes full color photographs, valuable tables of information including fun “Do You Know?” facts, and a comprehensive Bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25485073">
              <a id="link_25485073" href="http://export.gov/ccg/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25485073,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25142617}); ">
               Country Commercial Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Look no further than the U.S. Commercial Service’s Country Commercial Guides, written by U.S. Embassy trade experts worldwide….. An excellent starting point for everything you need to know about exporting and doing business overseas detailing 8 important weigh stations on your export journey.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24078422">
              <a id="link_24078422" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.portal.euromonitor.com/portal/server.pt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24078422,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24078422}); ">
               Passport Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               NOTE: Search on your country in the upper right hand corner of the screen of this database to bring up all the reports about your country. Pay particular attention to the report called "Consumer Lifestyles."
               <br />
               <br />
               Passport Reference, published by Euromonitor, provides comparable international business intelligence on countries, consumers and industries. It offers access to more than 1 million country, market and lifestyle statistics; 4,500 markert research reports (global reports, country reports, industry reports, company reports and lifestyle reports); 205 country profiles: company market share and brand share rankings; 35,000 business information sources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24066648">
              <a id="link_24066648" href="http://data.worldbank.org/topic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066648,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19905163}); ">
               World Bank
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Good for media and communication, internet use, science and technology, etc.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20596117">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20596117">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20596117">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Industry Data and History
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20596117">
          <div id="boxatt20596117" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25006930">
              <a id="link_25006930" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.bizminer.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25006930,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 14260480}); ">
               BizMiner
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               BizMiner produces the most granular industry statistical reports in the market. We offer industry financial analysis benchmarks for over 5,000 lines of business and industry market trends on thousands more. Our market analysis reports are available at the national and local levels down to the zip code. Focus on sales classes of &lt; $500m.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24067160">
              <a id="link_24067160" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9781414486864&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24067160,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13228948}); ">
               Encyclopedia of American Industries
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides detailed, comprehensive information on a wide range of industries in every realm of American business. The work consists of more than 1,000 detailed profiles of the manufacturing and service industries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24067172">
              <a id="link_24067172" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/3TNJ" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24067172,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24067172}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Emerging Industries
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides information about the inception, emergence and current status of new and established industries and business segments that are pioneering new technologies, introducing break-through marketing strategies or implementing innovative means of serving new markets. Consists of detailed profiles newer industries, such as biometrics, risk management services, satellites, specialty tourism, and others.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24067179">
              <a id="link_24067179" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/3TNI" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24067179,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24067179}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Global Industries
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Chronicles the history, development and current status of the world's most lucrative and high profile industries. Each entry covers size and economic/social impact of the industry; its organization and structure; its history and development; major countries and companies involved (including rankings); size and nature of the work force; and research.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25486828">
              RMA Annual Statement Studies
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library B level, call # 657.3 R627a. Contains composite financial data on manufacturing, wholesaling, retailing, service, and contracting lines of business. Arranged by SIC code, this work makes it possible to compare one company's performance relative to other companies in the same line of business.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5497820" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20596119">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20596119">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20596119">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20596119">
          <div id="boxatt20596119" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24025158">
              <a id="link_24025158" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24025158,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24025158}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24025159">
              <a id="link_24025159" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24025159,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Financial Analysis and Risk Management', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24025159}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
